title: Cant log in/sign up
body: So today i tried to log in to my account and at first, i got an error saying our servers has problem pls wait with error code 003. Then aftr some time problem started showing cant connect to the server. And then when I tried to sign up page I got stuck in infinite cloud flare loop for some reason.

replies.body: Heya, this error code usually indicates a connection issue.  Combined with the site errors, you might be getting blocked by your network.  See if port forwarding as well as configuring DNS in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help fix this up.
